cast.name: 卡门·布塞贝斯 Carmen Bsaibes

introduction: The series revolves around the social life of a group of people in the city of Port Said, where they are linked by a hotel and the Teatro Eugenie. The hero of the story lives in Port Said with his Lebanese wife Aida and their daughter Nadia after a traditional marriage without love. While coming from Cairo Cariman, who fled after a fight between her and her husband led to his death on her hands. Cariman escapes from Cairo to Port Said and there meet the unique and parents of Teatro Eugenie and hide their true identity, what awaits her and how will the story of love between her and Fred.
